message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business or personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $950000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the potential benefits the product could bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $975000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $960000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.
